mapper.select: SELECT cum.couponUserIdx, c.couponName, c.discountValue AS discountValue FROM coupon_user_mapping cum JOIN coupon c ON cum.couponIdx = c.couponIdx WHERE cum.userIdx = #{userIdx} AND c.couponStatus = 0 AND c.couponExpDate > NOW() AND c.couponCategory = '영화'
